content.text: 1 (1 ounce) package garlic and mushroom soup mix
content.eamr: ( ing-2 "1 (1 ounce) package garlic and mushroom soup mix" )

content.text: 1 (14 ounce) can artichoke hearts, drained and chopped
content.eamr: ( ing-3 "1 (14 ounce) can artichoke hearts, drained and chopped" )
( ing-5 "1 (6 ounce) can crab meat, drained" )

content.text: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Preheat"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-0-0 "oven"@11:15 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "350 degrees F"@19:32 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-0-1 "175 degrees C"@34:47 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 1) In a 1-1/2 quart casserole dish, combine mayonnaise, sour cream, soup mix, artichoke hearts, cheese and crab meat.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "combine"@36:43 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "mayonnaise"@44:54 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "sour cream"@56:66 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "soup mix"@68:76 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "artichoke hearts"@78:94 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "cheese"@96:102 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "crab meat"@107:116 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-1-0 "a 1-1/2 quart casserole dish"@6:34 / TOOL )
	)
)
